name: A Guess in the Dark
description:
A game with no pixels!

*If the game is too hard, click "Reveal Pixels" to see the game!*

Instructions:

In this game, you need to grab a key and escape an enemy with seeing any pixels! Every map is randomly generated (the difficulty of every map is randomized) and grabbing the key would spawn in a new one.  You beat the game by clearing 10 levels and a special sound effect will be played.

Different Sound Effects and Their Meanings:

A video about the making of this game:

Take that, Verily Fine (a YouTuber who made a game with one-pixel).

Check out his project: https://verily-fine.itch.io/one-pixel-survival
